pages.disclaimer: Important Information: Read Floating Fortune' Disclaimer Floating Fortune Home About Casino Contact 18+ Disclaimer Welcome to Floating Fortune Casino! We are excited to have you onboard our luxurious floating casino. Before you embark on a thrilling gaming experience, we would like to bring your attention to our disclaimer. Please read this disclaimer carefully to ensure that you understand the terms and conditions that govern your participation in our casino activities. Legal Age and Eligibility Floating Fortune Casino is intended for adults aged 18 years and above. By accessing our casino, you confirm that you meet the legal age requirement to participate in gambling activities. It is your responsibility to abide by the laws and regulations of your jurisdiction regarding online gambling. Responsible Gambling At Floating Fortune Casino, we are committed to promoting responsible gambling practices. We encourage our players to gamble responsibly and set limits on their gaming activities. If you feel that your gambling habits are becoming problematic, we urge you to seek help from relevant organizations that provide support for gambling addiction. Availability of Services While we strive to provide a seamless gaming experience, we cannot guarantee uninterrupted access to our casino platform due to technical issues or maintenance activities. We are not liable for any losses incurred as a result of disruptions in service. Please ensure that you have a stable internet connection and compatible device to access our casino games. Fair Play and Security Floating Fortune Casino is committed to ensuring fair play and the security of our players' personal information. We use advanced encryption technologies to safeguard your data and employ strict security measures to prevent unauthorized access to our platform. Our casino games are powered by certified Random Number Generators (RNGs) to guarantee randomness and fairness in outcomes. Payment and Withdrawal Terms When you engage in real money gaming at Floating Fortune Casino, you agree to abide by our payment and withdrawal terms. Deposits can be made using various payment methods available on our platform, and withdrawals are subject to verification procedures to prevent fraud and money laundering. Please note that processing times and fees may apply to certain transactions. Intellectual Property Rights All content, including logos, graphics, and software, displayed on Floating Fortune Casino is protected by intellectual property laws and belongs to our company. You are granted a limited license to use our platform for personal entertainment purposes only. Any unauthorized use or reproduction of our intellectual property is strictly prohibited and may result in legal action. Limitation of Liability Floating Fortune Casino shall not be held liable for any losses, damages, or expenses incurred by players while using our services. We do not guarantee winnings or make any representations regarding the outcomes of our casino games. By participating in our gaming activities, you acknowledge that you assume all risks associated with gambling. Changes to Terms and Conditions Floating Fortune Casino reserves the right to amend or update these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. It is your responsibility to review the latest version of our disclaimer to stay informed about any changes that may affect your gaming experience. Continued use of our services implies acceptance of the revised terms. Customer Support If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback regarding Floating Fortune Casino, please feel free to contact our customer support team. Our representatives are available around the clock to assist you with any inquiries and ensure that you have a positive gaming experience onboard our floating casino. We hope that you have a fantastic time at Floating Fortune Casino and enjoy our diverse range of exciting casino games. Thank you for choosing us as your preferred online gaming destination. Float on the waves of fortune and may luck be on your side! pages.policy: Your Privacy Matters: Learn about Floating Fortune' Privacy Policy Floating Fortune Home About Casino Contact 18+ Privacy Policy At FLOATING FORTUNE, we are committed to protecting the privacy of our users and keeping their personal information secure. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, how we use it, and the measures we take to keep it safe. Information We Collect When you use our services, we may collect certain information from you, including: Personal information such as your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, and payment information. Information about your use of our services, including your browsing history, game preferences, and interactions with our website. Device information such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and device identifiers. Geolocation data if you choose to enable location services for our games. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect from you for the following purposes: To provide and improve our services, including customizing your experience, analyzing usage patterns, and developing new features. To communicate with you, including sending updates about our games, promotions, and other relevant information. To process payments and fulfill transactions. To prevent fraud and abuse of our services. To comply with legal requirements and protect our rights and interests. Information Sharing We may share your information with third parties in certain circumstances, including: Service providers who help us with payment processing, customer support, marketing, and other operational tasks. Authorized third parties who assist us in analyzing user data and improving our services. Law enforcement agencies or government authorities when required by law or to protect our rights and interests. Data Security We take the security of your information seriously and have implemented various measures to safeguard it, including: Secure encryption protocols to protect data during transmission and storage. Restricted access controls to ensure that only authorized personnel can access your information. Regular monitoring and testing of our systems to identify and address security vulnerabilities. Data Retention We will only retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law. Your Choices You have the right to opt out of receiving promotional communications from us and to request that we delete or update your personal information. You can do so by contacting us at [email protected] Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for children under the age of 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from individuals in this age group. Changes to this Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices and legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a notice on our website or sending you an email. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at FloatingFortune@gmail.com Last updated: January 1, 2022. pages.terms: Stay Informed: Review Floating Fortune' Terms and Conditions Floating Fortune Home About Casino Contact 18+ Terms and Conditions Welcome to Floating Fortune, the premier online casino experience! Before you begin enjoying all of the exciting games and features that our casino has to offer, please take a moment to review the following Terms and Conditions. By accessing and using our website, you are agreeing to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website. Registration and Account In order to access the features of Floating Fortune, you must create an account on our website. You are responsible for providing accurate and up-to-date information when registering for an account. You are also responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. Floating Fortune reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time if we believe that you have violated these Terms and Conditions. Age Requirement You must be at least 18 years of age or the legal age for gambling in your jurisdiction in order to access and use Floating Fortune. By using our website, you are representing that you meet this age requirement. Prohibited Activities When using Floating Fortune, you agree to not engage in any of the following activities: Violating any laws or regulations Posting or transmitting any material that is offensive, harmful, or obscene Interfering with the operation of our website Attempting to access unauthorized areas of our website Engaging in any fraudulent activity Using any automated means to access our website Impersonating any person or entity Intellectual Property All content on Floating Fortune, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Floating Fortune or its licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You are not permitted to use any of this content without the express permission of Floating Fortune. Payment and Deposits When making deposits on Floating Fortune, you agree to provide accurate and up-to-date payment information. Floating Fortune reserves the right to refuse deposits or withdraw funds from your account if we believe that the payment information provided is inaccurate or fraudulent. Withdrawals To withdraw funds from your Floating Fortune account, you must follow the withdrawal procedures outlined on our website. You may be required to provide additional documentation to verify your identity before a withdrawal can be processed. All withdrawal requests are subject to review and approval by Floating Fortune. Responsible Gaming Floating Fortune is committed to promoting responsible gaming practices. If you believe that you have a gambling problem, we encourage you to seek help from a professional organization. You can also set limits on your account to help manage your gaming activity. Termination Floating Fortune reserves the right to terminate your access to our website at any time and for any reason. We may also suspend or terminate your account if we believe that you have violated these Terms and Conditions or engaged in any prohibited activities. Limitation of Liability Floating Fortune is not liable for any damages or losses that result from your use of our website. We do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of any information on our website, and we are not responsible for any errors or omissions. Changes to Terms and Conditions Floating Fortune reserves the right to make changes to these Terms and Conditions at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the revised terms on our website. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically to ensure that you are aware of any updates. By using Floating Fortune, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us at FloatingFortune@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing Floating Fortune for your online gaming experience!
